explanation.overview: 这些名词都与'旅行'相关，但在持续时间、目的和体验上有所不同。

details.meaning: 指长途旅行，强调过程而非目的地，常带有情感色彩
details.example: Their journey across the desert took three weeks.（他们穿越沙漠的旅程花了三周时间。）

details.meaning: 泛指旅行行为或旅行经历，常用作不可数名词
details.example: International travel requires a valid passport.（国际旅行需要有效护照。）

details.meaning: 指短途旅行或往返行程，通常有明确目的地
details.example: We took a weekend trip to the mountains.（我们周末去山区旅行。）

details.meaning: 指有组织的游览，通常参观多个地点，带有观光目的
details.example: They went on a guided tour of the ancient ruins.（他们参加了古遗址的导游观光。）

details.meaning: 通常指短途的、有组织的游览或郊游，常常是一天内或几小时的活动。
details.example: We went on an excursion to the nearby waterfall.（我们去附近的瀑布进行了短途游。）

life_examples.journey: The train journey from Moscow to Vladivostok is epic.（从莫斯科到符拉迪沃斯托克的火车旅程非常壮观。）
life_examples.travel: Air travel has become more affordable.（航空旅行变得更便宜了。）
Travel broadens the mind.（旅行开阔眼界。）
life_examples.trip: Our family trip to Disneyland was magical.（我们全家去迪士尼的旅行很神奇。）
life_examples.tour: The wine tour included visits to five vineyards.（葡萄酒之旅包括参观五个葡萄园。）
life_examples.excursion: We went on an excursion to the nearby waterfall.（我们去附近的瀑布进行了短途游。）

common_errors.error: ❌ I bought souvenirs during my journey to Paris.
common_errors.correction: ✅ I bought souvenirs during my trip/tour to Paris.（短途购物旅行用trip/tour）
✅ The business trip was exhausting.（商务出差用trip）

common_errors.error: ❌ We went on a journey to the museum.
common_errors.correction: ✅ We went on a tour of the museum.（参观博物馆用tour）

common_errors.error: ❌ She loves to travel on long journeys.
common_errors.correction: ✅ She loves to travel on long trips.（长途旅行用trip）

common_errors.error: ❌ The tour was a great travel experience.
common_errors.correction: ✅ The tour was a great journey experience.（有组织的观光用tour）

common_errors.error: ❌ I went on an excursion to another country.
common_errors.correction: ✅ I went on a trip to another country.（excursion 多用于短途，国家间旅行用 trip。）

mini_test.question: 选择最合适的词：The ___ of self-discovery changed her life.
哪个词最适合描述'为期一天的学校郊游'？
填空：We booked a ___ that covers all the major landmarks.
选择正确答案：We went on a ___ to visit many cities in Europe.
选择正确答案：The hikers had a long ___ through the forest.
选择正确答案：The class went on an ___ to the museum.
